title: survey about @font-face embedding (web designers only)
content:
Web designers,  
please take part in this short survey about @font-face embedding (as introduced with [Safari 3.1](http://web.archive.org/web/20130205052844/http:/opentype.info/blog/2008/04/03/web-font-embedding-font-face-is-back/)):

[www.befrager.de/befragung.aspx?projekt=6743](http://web.archive.org/web/20130205052844/http:/www.befrager.de/befragung.aspx?projekt=6743 "www.befrager.de/befragung.aspx?projekt=6743")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130205052844im_/http:/typophile.com/files/safarifonts_3883.jpg)
author: Ralf H.

comments.content:
Thanks to everyone who participated. Here are the results:  
 [http://opentype.info/blog/2008/04/19/font-face-survey-results/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130205052844/http:/opentype.info/blog/2008/04/19/font-face-survey-results/ "http://opentype.info/blog/2008/04/19/font-face-survey-results/")
